text: Girl Shy is a 1924 American silent romantic comedy movie directed by Fred C. Newmeyer and Sam Taylor. It stars Harold Lloyd, Richard Daniels, Jobyna Ralston, Carlton Griffin, Nola Luxford, William Orlamond, Gus Leonard. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1924 comedy movies Category:1920s romance movies Category:1920s romantic comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Fred C. Newmeyer Category:Movies directed by Sam Taylor
title: Girl Shy
